title: No base attack speed buffs for ADC's?
body:
I know we all hate ADC's on the boards, but the lack of compensatory attack speed buffs is going to really hurt adc's in lane. Off the top of my head I can think of a few immediate effects:

- ADC's will do less damage in trades, which will make mage supports more viable
-It will disrupt the ADC build path, because you'll need to buy attack speed and damage on your first back instead of being able to get away with a BF sword. 
 As a result if you can beat your opponent to an attack speed item and a bf sword you're gonna wipe the floor with the enemy botlaner

- These are really going to hurt adc's that stack passives (Twitch, Kallista, Tristana, etc)

Discuss

replies.body:
They get AS through the runes.

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-722-notes#patch-precision

>Path Bonus
>PRECISION + ANY PATH : +18% Attack Speed
Yup. On top of that, Precision actually gives 18% attack speed instantly at level 1, whereas for Domination and Sorcery you only get the bonus adaptively (increase with level)
